Method Detail

SimulerJeu

public static int SimulerJeu(Grille grille,
                             Point p,
                             Tour t)
Main method of management rules of play determines whether a possible blow to the grid is valid or not..

Parameters:
grille - the current grid
p - the point where the pawn should be raised on the goban
t - the one which has the hand.
Returns:
a determinant value if the blow is to be valid, invalid, generates a capture or a suicide

Parameters:
